413930.name: Robotpencil Presents: Character Illustration - Fantasy
413930.description:
In this video tutorial, you will see the start and finish of a character illustration. From a Mock assignment, to thumbnails, to greyscale refinement and to color.

Three parts to this package which add up to roughly 100 minutes of video content.

Includes:
Photoshop brushes, Files, and Jpgs.
413930.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
